alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 13 at 11:43AM MDT until October 14 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM MDT SATURDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...Western Kiowa County and Eastern Kiowa County Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 8 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Western Kiowa County
